_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three knowledges [mn71:15.4]: Realization of the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
The many kinds of past lives [mn71:15.4]: Many eons of the world contracting
Many eons of the world expanding
Many eons of the world contracting and expanding
Laypeople who go to heaven when the body: Many more than one hundred laypeople
Ājīvaka ascetics who go to heaven when t: One Ājīvaka ascetic (who taught the efficacy of deeds and action)
